dynRDFa

Class QueryReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • dynRDFa.QueryReader

  • public class QueryReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The class parses a text file with a set of queries in it and then provides a way to hash into the set of queries using a name identifier. The application uses it for single query files.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static QueryReader createQueryReader(java.lang.String file)
      Create a new instance of QueryReader populated with queries from the provided file

      Get the string representing the specified query
